bookAuthors: COM, William Shakespeare, GONZO, SPWT, Kate Beckwitt, Lys Blakeslee
Plot: For fourteen years, Neo Verona has lived in terror of Lord Montague's iron rule. But in their despair, a light shines forth! Donning the guise of the Crimson Whirlwind, Juliet Capulet has chosen the path of the mercenary, opposing Montague on behalf of the people. When she falls for a noble who seems sympathetic to her cause, Juliet is devastated to learn he is a Montague! Is there any hope for a love that crosses enemy lines?
Characters: Juliet Fiammatta Arst De Capulet, Romeo
